Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Anantara Eastern Mangroves Hotel & Spa, you'll be centrally located in Abu Dhabi, convenient to Mushrif Mall and Sheikh Zayed Stadium. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Centre and Higher Colleges of Technology-AbuDhabi.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 222 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms feature bathtubs or showers with rainfall showerheads.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional amenities include concierge services, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at one of the resort's 3 restaurants. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the resort pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at one of the resort's 3 restaurants. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the resort pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional amenities include concierge services, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and gift shops/newsstands.
Make yourself at home in one of the 222 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms feature bathtubs or showers with rainfall showerheads.

With a stay at Anantara Eastern Mangroves Hotel & Spa, you'll be centrally located in Abu Dhabi, convenient to Mushrif Mall and Sheikh Zayed Stadium. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Centre and Higher Colleges of Technology-AbuDhabi.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Mushrif Mall - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Centre - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Sheikh Zayed Stadium - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Higher Colleges of Technology-AbuDhabi - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Khalifa Park - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Abu Dhabi Ice Rink - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Al Jazaeera Sports Club - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
Red Crescent Authority - 6.4 km / 4 mi
Al Wahda Club - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi
Al Wahda Mall - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi
Shaikh Khalifa Medical City - 7.7 km / 4.8 mi
Abu Dhabi Mall - 7.8 km / 4.8 mi
The Galleria - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi
Khalifa Center - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi

The nearest airports are:
Abu Dhabi (ZVJ-Abu Dhabi Bus Station) - 6.7 km / 4.1 mi
Abu Dhabi (AUH-Abu Dhabi Intl.) - 21.3 km / 13.2 mi

The preferred airport for Anantara Eastern Mangroves Hotel & Spa is Abu Dhabi (AUH-Abu Dhabi Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No date, name and room change allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. Compulsory Tourism Dirham Fee of 15 AED to be paid by guest directly to the hotel per room per night. No Pets are allowed in the property”. Furthermore drones are not allowed within the property premises. During the Holy month of RAMADAN, restrictions may apply for the operation of the restaurant and bars of the hotel as per U.A.E Law. Kindly be informed that effective immediately, the concept of Ingredients restaurant will be changed from buffet to “a la carte” menus for the lunch and dinner. All Half Board and Full Board guests may choose from the 3-course (Starters or Soup, Main course and Dessert) menu options available in the restaurant for the same value.Beverages as usual will include still water, soft beverages and a variety of fresh juices.
